description: QUBO optimizer that uses simulated annealing to solve a QUBO problem.

time_limit.description: Maximum allowed time for optimization (in seconds).

num_iterations.description: Number of iterations to perform in the simulated annealing solver.

initial_temperature.description: Starting temperature for the simulated annealing process.

cooling_rate.description: Multiplicative cooling factor applied at each iteration (e.g., 0.999).
